title: geth automatically invalidate transactions ?
body:
Hi there,

I use the geth for a pool. some times I can see it show out some transactions log. But I never sent a command to the geth.

#### System information

Geth version: `geth 1.8.13-stable-225171a4`
OS & Version: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS

here is the logs:

````
INFO [08-21|05:54:51.409] Commit new mining work                   number=6183720 txs=136  uncles=0 elapsed=1.426s
````
